articles.title: James Van Der Beek’s Family Earns $1 Million From GoFundMe in Hours After His Death - Variety
articles.description: James Van Der Beek's wife and six children reached the $1 million goal on their GoFundMe following the actor's death.
articles.content:
The community has come together in a big way following the death of James Van Der Beek.

articles.title: Bijou Phillips is hospitalized and searching for a kidney donor: 'I need help' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Bijou Phillips has issued an urgent plea for help in finding a living kidney donor. After a 2017 transplant left her suffering 'many complications,' the actress has been hospitalized and needs a new kidney.
articles.content:
Bijou Phillips has issued a public plea for help as she battles kidney disease.
